org.transitime.db.structs.Vector

    Package Description
    org.transitime.db.structs

    • Uses of Vector in org.transitime.db.structs

      Subclasses of Vector in org.transitime.db.structs 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  VectorWithHeading
      Inherits from Vector but automatically calculates the heading.
      Methods in org.transitime.db.structs that return Vector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector Vector.beginning(double beginningLength)
      Returns the first part of the vector that is the length specified.
      Vector Vector.end(double beginningLength)
      Returns the last part of the vector, starting after the beginningLength
      Vector Block.getSegmentVector(int tripIndex, int pathIndex, int segmentIndex)
      Returns the Vector of the segment specified.
      Vector Vector.middle(double length1, double length2)
      Returns the middle of this vector that starts at length1 and ends at length2.
      Methods in org.transitime.db.structs with parameters of type Vector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double Location.distance(Vector v)
      Returns distance in meters between location and the closest match to the specified Vector.
      double Location.matchDistanceAlongVector(Vector v)
      Returns length along vector where this location is closest to the vector.

    • Uses of Vector in org.transitime.utils

      Methods in org.transitime.utils with parameters of type Vector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double Geo.distance(Location loc, Vector vector)
      Determines the distance between a location and a vector.
      static double Geo.matchDistanceAlongVector(Location loc, Vector vector)
      Determines best match of location to the vector.
